What's New in DockFlow 1.50

Browser Profile Selection (Beta)

  • Launch specific browser profiles when switching presets.
  • Supported browsers: Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Brave Browser, Vivaldi, Arc.
  • Why Beta? To keep DockFlow permission‑free, we use safe, non‑privileged workarounds. This may lead to minor quirks in some setups. We’d love your feedback to help us stabilize and expand this feature.
  • Safari limitation: Safari is not supported. Apple does not expose an API to control Safari profiles without additional permissions.

Improvements & Bug Fixes

  • General bug fixes and minor refinements across the app.

Have thoughts or issues? Send feedback from DockFlow → Help → Feedback. Your input directly shapes our roadmap.
